alert.note: Alert for Hinds (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 09 at 2:22PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Hinds County through 300 PM CDT... At 222 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Raymond, or near Byram, moving west at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Raymond around 225 PM CDT. Dry Grove around 235 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Learned. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
